Name: Math RTS
About the game: Math RTS is a new RTS strategy game that focuses on solving mathematical problems in a new and exciting way. You have to defend the chalkboard by collecting chalk and making problems for your opponents. The aim was to make math interesting and to bring fun to the classroom in a whole new way. You have to build up your economy by collecting chalk with ideas, expand by building brains and other buildings and make problems to send to your opponents. Features Local 8 player Multiplayer Play with up to 7 AI opponents of different strengths Play on 7 different size random maps Solve mathematical Problems Addition Subtraction Multiplication Division and more
